response.raw_message_text:
{
    "risk_factors": [
        ("number of past arrests", "medium", "One prior arrest indicates some involvement with the criminal justice system."),
        ("conviction history", "medium", "A conviction shows a confirmed contact with the criminal justice system."),
        ("height and weight", "low", "Within normal range, no red flags."),
        ("living situation", "low", "Stable living arrangement with spouse."),
        ("education level", "medium", "Lack of high school diploma or GED may limit employment opportunities."),
        ("employment history", "low", "Two jobs in a year suggests some stability, although limited work experience is a concern."),
        ("drug use", "low", "No recent drug use."),
        ("depression symptoms", "medium", "Occasional feelings of depression may affect judgment and decision-making."),
        ("childhood household size", "low", "Larger household size during childhood does not necessarily indicate risk."),
        ("religious beliefs", "low", "Belief in a higher power generally has a positive influence on behavior.")
    ],
    "prediction": "NO",
    "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 8 inches and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He is married and is currently living with his spouse. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived in a household of size 8. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
